author: Luke Lee
description: All-in-One Presence Detection System - combines WiFi MQTT detection, GPS geofencing, Anyone logic, manual override, and delayed away. Includes individual presence drivers and composite aggregation driver for 'anyone home' functionality
releaseNotes: Version 0.3.3 - CRITICAL HOTFIX: Completely simplified componentRefresh to prevent StackOverflowError. ComponentRefresh now only acknowledges the call without any processing to eliminate all infinite loop possibilities. Statistics updates handled exclusively through componentPresenceHandler.
